title: Inventing our Futures - Lessons from the Ars Electronica & nfrontier

speakers.name: Katja Vedder
speakers.description: Katja macht als Impulsgeberin für Innovation in Produktion und Prototyping mit dem MakerCube-Team, eine Initiative von OpenCampus, digitale Fertigungstechnologien für Start-ups und KMUs mobil in Schleswig-Holstein verfügbar. Sie konzipiert Workshops, hält Vorträge und vernetzt...

speakers.name: Daniel Büning
speakers.description: nFrontier is based tech-driven innovation company. We fuse design, engineering, and prototyping to create impactful products & experiences.

speakers.name: Matthew Gardiner
speakers.organization: Ars Electronica Future Lab | Studio Matthew Gardiner
speakers.description: Dr Matthew Gardiner is an artist most well known for his work with origami and robotics. He coined the term Oribot 折りボト and then created Oribotics, a field of art/science research that thrives on the aesthetic, biomechanic, and morphological connections between nature, origami...
